name: Mutant Mimics
description:
Welome to Mutant Mimics!!

Exlore caves to find treasure!
But watch out, only one chest is real;
the rest are radioactive mutant mimics!

Use the geiger-counter to figure out which chest is the real one

--- C O N T R O L S ---

WASD: Move the player

E: Interact with object in highlighted square

F: Pick up item on player square

G: Drop item on player square
